                                                                                                                                          the gods don't take kindly to hubris. Note that minor NPCs who can't take
                                                                                                                                          consequences thus can't create a Roar aspect at a cost; they simply fail altogether.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                            none;">Olivia
                                                                                                                                              fails the roll to create the roar aspect <b><i>Intensely Focused</i></b> for her debate
                                                                                                                                              against Lord Marcus Sidonius. The GM decides that Olivia will gain the mild
                                                                                                                                              consequence <b><i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                              normal">Oblivious to her Surroundings</i></b>. The GM gets one free invocation
                                                                                                                                            of that consequence.<span style="
                                                                                                                                          "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                            none;">Minor
                                                                                                                                              GM characters can roar with something they are skilled at, but lose the Roar
                                                                                                                                              aspect automatically if they have to use an ability they are bad at.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                none;">The
                                                                                                                                                  NPC Lord Marcus Sidonius is skilled (+2) at appraising goods, negotiating
                                                                                                                                                  contracts, and avoiding a straight answer, so he might roar by beating around
                                                                                                                                                  the bush with a flowery opening speech to avoid getting to the point. He is bad
                                                                                                                                                  (-2) at physical activity and admitting he's wrong, so he would automatically
                                                                                                                                                  lose his roar aspect if he had to face evidence that he gave incorrect figures,
                                                                                                                                                  or if Olivia managed to move around so that he is huffing and puffing to keep
                                                                                                                                                up with her pace.<span style="
                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                              <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                "><a name="Compelling_a_Froth_Aspect"><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                  normal">Compelling a Roar Aspect</b></a><span style="mso-bookmark:
                                                                                                                                                  Compelling_a_Froth_Aspect"></span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                    none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                      ">Naturally, a Roar aspect can be compelled,
                                                                                                                                                    either by the player who created it or by the GM. If the player compels it, it</span>'s worth a fate point,
                                                                                                                                                    as usual. If the GM compels a character's Roar aspect, however, refusing a
                                                                                                                                                    compel not only costs the player a fate point as usual, but also removes the
                                                                                                                                                    Roar aspect from play. See <b>"Losing a
                                                                                                                                                  Roar Aspect"</b> on the next page.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                  6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                  "><a name="Losing_Your_Froth_Aspect"><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                    normal">Losing Your Roar Aspect</b></a><span style="mso-bookmark:
                                                                                                                                                    Losing_Your_Froth_Aspect"></span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                      none;"><span style="
                                                                                                                                                        ">A Roar aspect lasts until you choose to
                                                                                                                                                        use a non-adjacent approach or until the end of the scene, whichever comes
                                                                                                                                                        first. Barring any interference, of course. If the GM offers you a fate point
                                                                                                                                                      to keep on Raging just as you</span>'re about to calm things down, for example, accepting means you're
                                                                                                                                                      stuck with it for a while. You can pretty much count on the GM using this to
                                                                                                                                                      your disfavor one way or another. What happens when the Raging barbarian can't
                                                                                                                                                      stop raging, even though the only combatants still standing are his allies?
                                                                                                                                                      Excellent question. Hopefully someone will survive to answer it.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                        none;">As
                                                                                                                                                          noted earlier, refusing a compel on a Roar aspect not only costs a fate point,
                                                                                                                                                          but immediately removes the Roar aspect from play. There are no half-measures
                                                                                                                                                          with Roar—either you're roaring or you're not. And as soon as you're not,
                                                                                                                                                        it's over.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                        none;">Back
                                                                                                                                                          to our earlier example, where Olivia was <b><i>Intensely Focused</i></b>. During their
                                                                                                                                                          heated conversation, Olivia had started walking briskly to wear Sidonius down.
                                                                                                                                                          Their walk has led them to a glade outside of town. Unfortunately for the both
                                                                                                                                                          of them, one lone Orc has strayed from its pack to the same glade. If it
                                                                                                                                                          notices them, more will soon follow. If Olivia wants to flee (Quick) or defend
                                                                                                                                                          (Forceful), she will have to lose the Roar aspect. The GM offers a shiny fate
                                                                                                                                                          point if Olivia will keep roaring, and Olivia's player accepts. She thinks she
                                                                                                                                                          can Cleverly hide from the Orc� Let's hope she has not underestimated their
                                                                                                                                                        keen sense of smell.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                        none;">Roar
                                                                                                                                                          isn't something to be entered into lightly. Roaring can mean risk and loss just
                                                                                                                                                          as easily as power and glory.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                            6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                            "><a name="Magic_Rituals_in_the_Roar_Phas"><b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                              &quot;Liberation Sans&quot;;">Magic Rituals in the
                                                                                                                                                              Roar Phase</span></b></a><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                none;"><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                  ">Priests and others who bravely court the
                                                                                                                                                                  favor of the gods can create very special aspects through magic rituals during
                                                                                                                                                                the Roar phase. See under</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                mso-ascii-"> </span><b>"Battle Rituals"</b>.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                "><a name="So_Why_Have_the_Roar_Phase"><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                  normal">So Why Have the Roar Phase?</b></a><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                    ">Fate veterans may wonder why we have a
                                                                                                                                                                    Roar phase and its effects, if both sides can create an equal number of
                                                                                                                                                                    advantageous aspects. Here</span>'s why:<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                    none;">First,
                                                                                                                                                                      it's part of the setting for a lot of historical material that inspires
                                                                                                                                                                      fantasy, such as ritual calling-out and boasting in many societies from Western
                                                                                                                                                                    Europe to Western Africa to the Pacific Islands<span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                  12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                    none;">Second,
                                                                                                                                                                      even when Roar aspects aren't used directly against each other, it adds to the
                                                                                                                                                                      fiction by shining a spotlight on each character in conflict and what they're
                                                                                                                                                                      about. These aspects are used in a variety of ways; the Roar phase doesn't
                                                                                                                                                                      guarantee a zero sum between GM and players because some of them are won by way
                                                                                                                                                                      of taking a consequence before the battle even starts.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                        none;">Third,
                                                                                                                                                                          it lets you create lots of temporary aspects with free invocations you can
                                                                                                                                                                          stack later (see "Invoking for Effect") at the moment in combat when the enemy
                                                                                                                                                                          is not trying to hurt you yet, so you don't have to worry about defending.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                            none;">Finally,
                                                                                                                                                                              it's the only way to create certain types of advantages, particularly battle
                                                                                                                                                                              rituals (see <b>"Magic"</b>).<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                "><a name="Exchanges"><b><span style="mso-bidi-;
                                                                                                                                                                                  ">Exchanges</span></b></a><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                      ">Next, each character takes a turn in
                                                                                                                                                                                      order. On their turn, a character can take one of the four actions. Resolve the
                                                                                                                                                                                      action to determine the outcome. The conflict is over when only one side has
                                                                                                                                                                                      characters still in the fight.</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                        none;">Rolf
                                                                                                                                                                                          has been challenged for leadership of his crew by First Mate Hans, in front of
                                                                                                                                                                                          the assembled scurvy sailors of the good ship <i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                          normal">Fiero</i>. This is a fairly dramatic point in the story and the GM
                                                                                                                                                                                          decides to run it as a conflict. The two opponents will deal other stress
                                                                                                                                                                                          through use of bombastic boasting, savage threats, well-crafted arguments, and
                                                                                                                                                                                          base personal attacks. It's possible that they may come to blows, but what
                                                                                                                                                                                          matters is convincing the crew to fall in behind one of them.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                            "><a name="Exchanges_in_Combat"><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                              normal">Exchanges in
                                                                                                                                                                                                Combat</b></a><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                  ">While various types of conflict in Fate</span>—social, mental, physical,
                                                                                                                                                                                                  etc.—use the same basic rules,combat and warfare can play out as a
                                                                                                                                                                                                  special type of conflict, relying much more than others on visual elements.
                                                                                                                                                                                                  When a conflict escalates into the physical, it's often time to go to the maps
                                                                                                                                                                                                and the minis.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">In
                                                                                                                                                                                                  the following discussion, anyone in a fight is called a <i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                  normal">fighter</i>. They don't literally have to be a career soldier or
                                                                                                                                                                                                anything—it's just shorthand.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">To
                                                                                                                                                                                                  keep track of things in a combat, every fighter is represented on the
                                                                                                                                                                                                  battlefield by a miniature or token of some kind. Miniatures are ideal, because
                                                                                                                                                                                                  they give the battlefield more color and visual interest. If they don't come
                                                                                                                                                                                                  pre-painted, they can be fun to paint, whether you're good at it or not. If you
                                                                                                                                                                                                  don't have any miniatures handy, distinctive markers such as cardstock standees
                                                                                                                                                                                                  or cardboard tokens will do the trick equally well. For nameless NPCs, you can
                                                                                                                                                                                                  even use coins of varying denominations. (Hey, they're nameless for a reason.
                                                                                                                                                                                                  Representing them with pennies is� apt.) As long as you can tell who's who,
                                                                                                                                                                                                you're golden.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                none;"><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p> </o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><b>Why are miniatures so
                                                                                                                                                                                                    popular in roleplaying games and what do we use them for in physical conflict
                                                                                                                                                                                                  scenes?</b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                  text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                  none"><b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                  color:black">Visualizing the action</span></b>: Playing out scenes
                                                                                                                                                                                                  is visually exciting and focuses the attention of the players. Having a
                                                                                                                                                                                                  scaled-down model of the scene also helps the gamemaster define zones and the
                                                                                                                                                                                                  entire group stay on the same page as the events unfold.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                    text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                    none"><b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                    color:black">Adjudicating movement and maneuvers</span></b>: It helps to see what
                                                                                                                                                                                                    is going on in order to decide whether Ragnar can actually move past Salvia, or
                                                                                                                                                                                                    whether the sparse trees provides any cover against Goomba's ranged attack.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                      text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                      none"><b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                        color:black">Suggesting actions and supporting tactical
                                                                                                                                                                                                      decisions</span></b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                      color:black">: Just as the GM gets a better idea of what is possible, being
                                                                                                                                                                                                      able to see the action suggests to the players some of the cool actions their
                                                                                                                                                                                                    characters might take.</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p> </o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><a name="Weight"><b><span style="mso-bidi-;
                                                                                                                                                                                                        ">Weight</span></b></a><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                            ">Weight represents how importance,
                                                                                                                                                                                                            influence, size, or numbers favor one side over the other.</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                              6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><b>Weight in Combat</b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                              ">Things like a fighter</span>'s facing and
                                                                                                                                                                                                              positioning within a zone don't really come into play—these rules don't care
                                                                                                                                                                                                              about that level of detail. Instead, it's the relative <i>weight</i> of combatants within a zone.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">Add
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  up the weights of all fighters on each side of a combat in a zone. If one
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  side's total is greater than the other, that side <i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  normal">outweighs</i> the other side, or is "heavier." Unless a character
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  has a specific stunt that would affect their weight, the general size of the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  character determines weight. Humans and most player character types normally
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  have an individual weight of 1. Other creatures (monsters) can have different
                                                                                                                                                                                                                weights.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;"><b>If the heavier side
                                                                                                                                                                                                                outweighs their opponents in the zone by at least two to one,</b> they can replace
                                                                                                                                                                                                              any one of the dice they rolled with a [+].<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;"><b>If the heavier side
                                                                                                                                                                                                              attacker outweighs their target by at least four to one,</b> they can
                                                                                                                                                                                                              replace <i>two</i> of the Fate
                                                                                                                                                                                                            dice results with [+].<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;">It's
                                                                                                                                                                                                              a good idea to indicate weight advantage on the battle map using Fate dice,
                                                                                                                                                                                                              Campaign Coins' Fate Tokens, or Deck of Fate cards so you'll remember when it's
                                                                                                                                                                                                            time to roll dice.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;"><i>Deliah is facing off
                                                                                                                                                                                                              against a couple of City guards; they outweigh her two to one, so the GM sets
                                                                                                                                                                                                            down a Fate Token to mark a </i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                            ">[+]<i> and
                                                                                                                                                                                                            rolls the dice for the guards' attack. She rolls [</i>00-+]<i>, but replaces the [</i>-]<i> with a [</i>+]<i>, for a final result of [</i>00++]<i>. On her turn, Deliah concentrates her
                                                                                                                                                                                                            attack on taking one guard out as fast as possible to gain a respite; by
                                                                                                                                                                                                            himself, the surviving guard no longer outweighs her and does not get the
                                                                                                                                                                                                            chance to change one die result to </i>[+]<i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                          normal">.</i></span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;"><i>Alas for Deliah, the
                                                                                                                                                                                                            guard hangs on long enough for reinforcements to show up, and she now faces
                                                                                                                                                                                                            four more guards. They outweigh her at least four to one (five to one, really,
                                                                                                                                                                                                          but there's no additional bonus) so they now get to change results on <b>two</b> dice, thus changing a [</i>0-+-] <i>roll to [</i>0+++]<i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                        normal">. Deliah is in trouble.</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;">Weight
                                                                                                                                                                                                          comes into play whenever common sense dictates it would be relevant. Always
                                                                                                                                                                                                          include it when attacking or defending, but not necessarily when creating an
                                                                                                                                                                                                          advantage or overcoming. It depends entirely on context. Generally speaking, if
                                                                                                                                                                                                          the mere presence of allies in a zone would help accomplish something, it's
                                                                                                                                                                                                        reasonable to include the weight advantage.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><i>Rolf wants to create an
                                                                                                                                                                                                          advantage against the horde of goblins he's fighting by toppling a ruined wall
                                                                                                                                                                                                          onto them. He and his allies outweigh the goblins in their zone, but in this
                                                                                                                                                                                                          case that's not really helping him since he's acting alone, so he'll roll as
                                                                                                                                                                                                        usual.</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><i>Later, channeling his
                                                                                                                                                                                                          ancestors of old, he attempts to create another advantage by intimidating the
                                                                                                                                                                                                          opposition with a savage battle cry. In this case, the GM rules that the
                                                                                                                                                                                                          presence of his allies around him makes Rolf's threats more credible, so he
                                                                                                                                                                                                        rolls the dice and can change one result to </i>[+]<i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                      normal">.</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">If
                                                                                                                                                                                                        the relative weights of two sides change during a round, adjust the dice
                                                                                                                                                                                                        accordingly on the<i>next</i> roll
                                                                                                                                                                                                        after they've changed. In other words, who outweighs whom can change on a
                                                                                                                                                                                                        turn-by-turn basis, no matter how things started out.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;"><i>Our three heroes, along
                                                                                                                                                                                                            with a mercenary pal of theirs, face off against four lizardmen in their zone.
                                                                                                                                                                                                            So far, their relative weights are equal, so everyone will roll normally on
                                                                                                                                                                                                            their attacks and defenses. Rolf acts first, and manages to take out two
                                                                                                                                                                                                            lizardmen fighters. Now the PCs outweigh the lizardmen two to one, so when the
                                                                                                                                                                                                          next player's turn comes around, they'll get the benefit of the </i>[+]<i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                        normal"> die on their roll.</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                        6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><b>Weight in Social Conflicts</b><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                      12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                          ">In social conflicts---for example, a
                                                                                                                                                                                                          debate between two leaders for control of a Guild---weight represents the
                                                                                                                                                                                                          importance, influence, and authority of the opponents. Rank, reputation,
                                                                                                                                                                                                          credibility, and circumstances will factor into this, and unlike physical
                                                                                                                                                                                                        conflicts, sheer numbers may not carry the day.</span><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                      12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;">Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                        Weights<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><i>When addressing the
                                                                                                                                                                                                        Royal Court:</i><span style="
