                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;">The
                                                                                                                                                                                                          monarch has a weight of 8;<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;">A
                                                                                                                                                                                                            high-ranking Houselord has a weight of 4;<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;">The
                                                                                                                                                                                                              Houselord of a small Mercantile House has a weight of 2;<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">Commoners
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  have a weight of 1, no matter how many of them are there.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><i>In a scholarly debate:</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">A
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      renowned academician might have a weight of 4.<span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">A
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        run-of-the mill professor might have a weight of 2;<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;">A
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mere graduate student would have a weight of 1;<span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;">Commoners
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            would have a weight of 0; it takes a swarm to add up to a weight of 1 and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          heckle enough to derail an argument.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><b>Swarms</b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ">Some creatures, like hornets or crows, are
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            so small they have a weight of 0. They are too small to affect a creature of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            weight 1 or more unless there are a large number of them. Defeating an
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            individual creature with weight 0 is handled using the overcome action instead
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          of a conflict. So when creatures such as these attack</span><span style="mso-ascii-;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "> </span><i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        normal">en masse</i>, they do so in a <i>swarm</i>.<span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;">Swarms
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          come in three basic sizes. A <i>small
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          swarm</i>, the size of an average human, is weight 1. A <i>big swarm</i>, one about the size of a bear,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          is weight 2. A <i>huge swarm</i>, one
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          as big as a troll, is weight 4.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;">If
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              you want <i>really</i> huge
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              swarms, the kind that can cover an entire farmstead, use several huge swarms.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Five huge swarms are a lot more interesting and versatile in a fight than one
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              gargantuan weight 20 swarm. Not only can five huge swarms spread out to five
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              different zones, they can also work together to get a teamwork bonus. See <b>"Characters and Creatures"</b> for
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            more about groups of adversaries.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;"><b><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;">"What if I want to use swarms of something larger, like
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              wolves or hyenas?"</span></i></b><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">Sure,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  you can do that too. See <b>"Groups of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Minions"</b> for more details.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">While
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  they outweigh their opponents, swarms can't be damaged by normal attacks that
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  don't affect an entire zone, nor are they affected by opposed
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  movement---there's just too many of them to try to make them go anywhere they
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  don't want to go. Without a weapon such as an alchemical explosion, you have to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  invoke an aspect for effect to make your attack affect a wide area, like <b><i>Boiling
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Oil</i></b> or <b><i>Flooded Room</i></b>.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><i>Olivia and Rolf have run
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      into three big (weight 2) swarms of vampire bats spread out around the ancient
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ruins they were exploring. Right now the heroes are outweighed so their
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      particular weapons are useless against the swarm. With all his might, Rolf
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      knocks one of the giant pillars loose and uses the create an advantage action
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      to add the aspect <b>Wobbly Pillar</b>.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      On her action Olivia invokes the aspect for effect and is able to attack one of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      the swarms by pushing the pillar and letting it crash down on the bats.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><a name="Movement_on_the_Battlefield"><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          normal">Movement on the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Battlefield</b></a><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ">A fighter can move to an adjacent,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                uncontested zone during their turn as a free action. This is made more
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              difficult if:</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;">The
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                zone the fighter is in or going into has an aspect that suggests an obstacle.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;">The
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  fighter is attempting to move more than one zone.<span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;">Someone
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    is blocking the fighter, by grabbing or otherwise trying to stop zone change.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">If
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the first or second condition is met, the fighter will face passive opposition
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        to moving into another zone. If the third condition is met, they'll face active
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      opposition. Either way, it's an overcome action.<span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">Note
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        that because this is an overcome action, the fighter will at the very least
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        always have the option of succeeding with a serious cost. This means that if
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        they <i>really</i> want to get out
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        of their current zone, they will always be able to do so---but the cost may be
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      more than they're willing to bear.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><i>Rolf is on a <b>Narrow Mountain Path</b>, facing ranged
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        attacks from bandits throwing javelins from the <b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        normal">Sparsely Wooded Slope</b> above. Rolf really wants to move into this
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        adjacent zone to engage the bandits in melee, and the bandits oppose him.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Unfortunately, the GM rolls well for the bandits and they tie with Rolf. Rolf's
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        player still has the option to have Rolf succeed at a minor cost rather than
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        remain an easy target; he offers to give the bandits a boost on Rolf, <b>Winded For A Moment</b>, and the GM agrees.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;">Regardless
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            of the opposition and the outcome, opposed movement costs the fighter their
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          action for the turn.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;">Passive
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            opposition means the fighter's struggling against the environment. If either
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            the starting zone or destination zone has an aspect that suggests an obstacle
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            to be overcome, the difficulty is Fair (+2). If <i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            normal">both</i> zones have such an aspect, the difficulty is Great (+4).<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;"><i>Olivia is pinned in
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                an <b>Icy</b> open zone by enemy
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                archery volleys from a nearby cliff. She wants to get out and under cover of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                the nearby <b>Boulders</b>, so it's a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                passive roll and her difficulty is Great (+4) for the two adverse aspects.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;">If
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    the fighter is trying to move more than one zone, add +2 per additional zone to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    the difficulty. If these have adverse aspects, add +2 per adverse aspect as
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  well.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                &quot;Times New Roman&quot;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><i>Rolf wants to move out
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    of the <b>Avalanche!</b> zone,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    through the <b>Rockfall</b> zone,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    and into the <b>Tundra Plain</b> zone.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The difficulty will be +2 for the extra zone and +4 for the two adverse
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    aspects, for a total of +6. Difficult, but then again, so is recovering from
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  being buried under falling rock�</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;">Active
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    opposition means the fighter and their opponent(s) will make an opposed roll,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    with the opponent's total providing a difficulty for the fighter to overcome.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Moreover, the opposition can invoke adverse terrain aspects, as appropriate, to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  increase the difficulty by +2 per invocation.<span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><i>Deliah is struggling in
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    melee with a bandit who tried to prevent her from moving out of the <b>Gaping Cliff Edge</b> zone and into
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    the <b>Mountain Path</b> zone. It
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    would be an opposed roll instead, and the GM can invoke the adverse aspect to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    add to the difficulty.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <!--[endif]--><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><a name="Maneuvers"><b><span style="mso-bidi-;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ">Maneuvers</span></b></a><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ">It</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ">'s often important in combat to force your
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            opponents to be where you want <i>them</i> to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            be---and to resist being moved where they want <i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            normal">you</i> to be.</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;">We've
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                included some examples below of how you can take advantage of the four basic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                actions to create specific <i>maneuvers</i>.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;">Most
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    maneuvers allow your character to move to a more favorable location (e.g., adjacent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    zone with a useful aspect such as <b><i>Higher Ground</i></b> or <b><i>Good
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Footing</i></b>), or move an opponent to a less favorable location (adjacent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    zone with a troublesome aspect such as <b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    normal"><i>Avalanche!</i></b> or where
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  the opponent will be outweighed).<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><b>Maneuvers as Actions</b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><b>Maneuvers as actions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  should be declared <i>before</i> rolling.</b> The player should think
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  about the specific flair they want to add, and choose the appropriate maneuver.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  If it's not on this list, the GM can assist in making up the maneuver on the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  fly. Here are some examples of maneuvers that can be performed with basic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                actions:<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;"><b>Push</b>: When you and your
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                opponent are in the same zone and you succeed in an opposed overcome action,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                you can push the opponent back one zone as your action. At your discretion, you
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                can end in the same zone or choose to push only your opponent.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><b>Pull</b>: When you and your
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  opponent are in the same zone and you succeed in an opposed overcome action,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  you can move and pull the opponent with you one zone as your action.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><b>Charge</b>: When you run into
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    melee in an adjacent zone, you double your weight for one attack action.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Additionally, if you succeed with style, you can force the opponent back one
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    zone in a straight line at the end of your action (in addition to the attack).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    You both end in the same zone. However, if you fail in your attack, you give
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    your opponent a free boost---that's in addition to taking one stress for
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    failing the attack as normal; <i>and</i> also
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    in addition to the boost they would normally gain if they defended with style.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><i>Rolf shouts a mighty
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        battle cry and runs into the fray in the adjacent <b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        normal">Foredeck</b> zone, attacking two pirate sailors. He doubles his
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        weight thanks to the charge, so no one is outweighed. Alas for Rolf, the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        pirates defend with style, gaining not only a boost as normal but an <b>additional</b> boost for the failed
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      charge.</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
