                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><b>Full Defense</b>: When you create an
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      advantage to improve your defenses against attacks this turn, you create
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      a <b><i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      normal">Full Defense</i></b> aspect that you can invoke freely once for
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      every attack made against you, but the advantage goes away once you take any
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    other action.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><b>Full Attack</b>: When you fully commit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    to an attack while disregarding your own safety, you can make an attack lethal
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (see <b>"Lethal Attacks"</b>). To do
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    this, you must describe what you are doing and overcome a Good (+2) difficulty
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    using an appropriate approach; on a success, your next attack will be lethal.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    However, your give your opponent a boost that works in their favor when they
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    attack you, such as <b><i>Exposed</i></b>. A risky trade-off for
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  adding extra oomph to your attack.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><i>Ntombi decides to use a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Full Attack against the grizzly she unwittingly angered. She swings her
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    double-bladed polearm in a dizzying spiral to briefly force the grizzly
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    backward, then with a great cry suddenly lunges with one blade aimed at the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    beast's neck. She rolls an overcome action using her Flashy approach; on a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    success, Ntombi's next attack will cause lethal damage. However, the grizzly
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    gains an <b>In Range!</b> boost
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    for <b>its</b> next attack.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><b>Maneuvers as Boosts</b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><b>Maneuvers as boosts are
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      determined after the roll.</b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;"> Sometimes you land a lucky blow or make a skillful shot.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Instead of taking a boost for succeeding with style on an attack, you can
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      instead perform one of these maneuvers. Again, think about what you want to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    achieve, and interpret accordingly.</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><b>Knockback</b>: When you succeed with
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    style at a melee attack with a heavy weapon (e.g., two-handed mace), you can
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    knock the opponent back one zone at the end of your action. You and the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  opponent end the action in two different zones.<span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><b>Disarm</b>: When you succeed with
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  style at a melee attack, you can force your opponent to drop their weapon or
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  shield. This prevents the use of any equipment stunt associated with it until
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  they succeed at an overcome roll (difficulty +2) to pick it up or pick up
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                another handy piece of equipment.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;"><b>Footwork</b>: When you succeed with
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                style in a melee attack, you can move automatically one zone, even if someone
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                is opposing your movement.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><i>Deliah is fighting a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    crocodile at the water's edge, where it has an advantage. Next to her is a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    rocky upland terrain zone. Deliah succeeds with style with her attack, so
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    instead of a boost she can move one zone even though the rocky terrain would
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  normally provide her opposition.</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;">The
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    astute reader will notice that maneuvers as boosts are examples of invoking
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    aspects for effect. In this case the aspect is a boost so it goes away once
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    it's used, and since it's used as soon as it's gained, we don't bother writing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  the boost down.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <!--[endif]--></span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><a name="Lethal_Attacks"><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      normal">Lethal Attacks</b></a><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ">For a variety of reasons, some attacks are
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      more deadly than others. They</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;">'re less a matter of wearing your opponent down than of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      landing exceptional blows which can have an immediate and devastating effect on
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      the defender. In game terms, we call these attacks <i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    normal">lethal</i>.</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;">While
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      an average attack can usually be mitigated by checking a stress box, lethal
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      attacks go straight to the defender's consequences, bypassing their stress
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      track entirely. This means that a successful lethal attack will always mean
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      some sort of longer-lasting trauma for the defender---or, in the case of mere
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      minions, who don't <i>have</i> consequences
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      to begin with, instant defeat. (Probably by death. We don't call them "lethal
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    attacks" for nothing.)<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><b>Making an Attack Lethal</b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ">Broadly speaking, there are five main ways
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    to make an attack into a lethal attack.</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none">Using certain maneuvers.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none">Having a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    relevant stunt.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none">Using an
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    appropriate magic ritual.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none">Some deadly
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      creatures have lethal attacks.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none">Creating
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          such excellent attack conditions that the GM judges the attack to be lethal.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><b>Using Maneuvers</b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ">The Full Attack maneuver sets you up to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            deliver a lethal attack but makes you exposed as well. See the</span><span style="mso-ascii-;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "> </span><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          normal">"Maneuvers"</b> section for more
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        detail.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><b>Having A Stunt</b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ">Certain stunts with a special weapon or
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          using a particular technique can give particular attacks the ability to cause
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        lethal damage. Lethal damage is always a </span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ">"once per session" stunt effect. See the <b>"Equipment Stunts"</b> section for
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      more detail.</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><b>Using a Battle Ritual</b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ">Rituals essentially grant temporary stunts
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      and some rituals, such as </span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;">"Combat Fury," can grant the ability to cause lethal damage.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Lethal damage is always a "once per conflict" effect. See the <b>"Battle Rituals"</b> section for more
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    detail.</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><b>Deadly Creatures</b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ">Some creatures are just naturally deadly!
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      For example, creatures that are venomous (e.g., snakes, scorpions); creatures
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      with particularly dangerous fangs or claws (e.g., leopards, alligators,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      sharks); creatures with supernatural attacks (e.g., vampires, werewolves,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    demons.)</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><b>GM</b><b>'s Discretion</b><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ">Sometimes the players come up with a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        brilliant plan that leaves the enemy at a serious disadvantage. If they put
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        serious (and successful) effort into creating conditions that would make their
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        attack much more dangerous, the GM can decide to declare that an attack will do
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      lethal damage.</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><i>The heroes know they are
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        badly outnumbered by the goblin pack roaming the area, so they decide to create
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        an ambush to even things out. The GM offers to treat this as a challenge. The
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        heroes will have to create an advantage by locating a suitable ambush spot,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        create a second advantage by preparing the location, and overcome the goblins'
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        wariness to bring them into the prepared trap. Deliah scouts out the perfect
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        bottleneck in a narrow rocky pass; Rolf piles boulders above, ready to trigger
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        an avalanche; and Olivia brews a fantastic-smelling stew that should attract
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        goblins for leagues around. They prepared well and described their actions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        interestingly, so the GM declares that the ambush will indeed be lethal, both
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the direct damage caused by the avalanche and the heroes' first attack in
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      battle.</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">Often
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        such situations will be represented by lots of preparatory aspects and boosts,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        which will in turn convert into substantial bonuses. The GM should not give a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        deadly outcome in that situation---the bonuses will be damaging enough. But it
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        may be useful in a situation where the GM knows the players will be able to do
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        all that preparation, and just skip over it in favor of making the initial
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        attacks lethal rather than stretching out an otherwise unimportant conflict.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="page-break-before:always;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><a name="Magic"><b><span style="mso-bidi-font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            12.0pt;;">Fickle
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Gods and Lost Civilizations</span></b></a><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><b><span style="mso-bidi-;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ">Fickle Gods</span></b><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              normal"><span style="mso-bidi-
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                &quot;Liberation Sans Narrow&quot;">' Curses and Blessings: Design Notes</span></b><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ">This is an expansion of </span><b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;">"The Subtle Art"</span></b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ">, found in the <span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                color:black">Fate System Toolkit</span>. It adds a little mechanical crunch by
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                creating temporary stunts and aspects that can be invoked for effect. It is
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                suitable for a fantasy setting where the gods are powerful, capricious beings
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                who bicker among themselves and don't always show wisdom or restraint, such as
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              the Greek pantheon.</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
