                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;">If
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                used with skills, you may want to define or re-define a skill associated with
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                propitiating the gods and slinging their blessings and curses. Such a skill
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                might be called Commune, Propitiate, or Petition. Alternately, you could use
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Will as the skill for magic.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;">If
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    used with approaches, you only need to pick the appropriate one as usual at the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  time of praying.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><a name="Divine_Interest"><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    normal">Divine Interest</b></a><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ">The gods are fickle and dangerous</span>—their benevolent
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    attention is nearly as dangerous for devotees as their anger.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">Think
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        of people as pets, and the gods as their lackadaisical owners. There's not that
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        much communication going on, and every once in a while the owners remember to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        put some food down, but all too frequently they completely misunderstand
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        whether you wanted the litterbox cleaned, more water, or walkies. But pee on
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the carpet or ignore them for too long, and oh boy! It might be off to the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      pound with you. Or worse.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">To
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        represent this, the GM uses a method that looks similar to the character
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        sheet's consequence boxes to track <i>Divine
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Interest</i>. It functions like a set of consequences for the entire group of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        heroes, recording how much attention they have attracted among the gods. Note
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        that Divine Interest consequences cannot be used in conflicts between two
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      player characters.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><b>Attracting Divine Interest</b><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ">Examples of things that would cause Divine
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Interest (i.e., add to the next lowest open Divine consequence) include:</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none">Rolling [++++] or [----] on the dice. Even if a fate point is
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            used to re-roll, the point will be incurred although the result of the action
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          will be changed.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none">Obtaining a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Miraculous (+9) or better result—a.k.a. succeeding catastrophically.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none">Obtaining an
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Abysmal (-4) or worse result—a.k.a. heroic calamity.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none">Performing a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  magic ritual.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none">Certain
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    costs associated with magical stunts (see "<b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  normal">Magic"</b>).<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none">Doing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    something extravagant, extraordinary, eccentric, or otherwise distinguishing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    you from those around you, in place of taking a personal consequence.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><i>When Rhea rolls a [</i>----]<i> on her roll to decipher an old
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      grimoire containing useful nautical charts, her player invokes an aspect and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      spends one fate point to re-roll. She rolls a +1 instead so the failure is
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      averted, but the GM still marks a Divine consequence for the group.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><i>Pyrrhus has bitten off
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          more than he can chew. When a group of rowdy pirates takes him up on his
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          challenge to fight them all at once, one of them lands a terrible blow that
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          would result in a severe consequence. Rather than take it himself, Pyrrhus'
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          player opts to have the group gain a Divine consequence instead. Pyrrhus prays
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          to Zeus for strength. And the god answers� with lightning bolts!</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;">The
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              GM tracks four Divine Interest consequences—two mild consequences, one
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              moderate, and one severe—for the group of adventurers, each of which
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              represents on-going attention from the gods; you can attract the attention of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              different gods this way, or get the same one more and more excited about your
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              adventure. They're not watching you constantly, but occasionally they remember
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              your existence and intervene in your favor or against it, depending on the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            relationship.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><a name="Sample_Divine_Interest_Consequ"><b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              &quot;Liberation Sans&quot;;">Sample Divine Interest
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Consequences</span></b></a><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;"><b>Mild Consequences</b>:<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ">Clamor of Armies</span></i> (Ares, Mars, Tyr)<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ">Hair Turning Leaf-Green</span></i><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      12.0pt;"> (Artemis, Diana)</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ">Persistent Localized Thunderstorm</span></i> (Zeus, Jupiter, Tlaloc)<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ">River Running Backwards</span></i><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            12.0pt;"> (Tethys, Chalchiuhtlicue)</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ">Chiming Bells Whenever Someone Is Lying</span></i> (Hera, Thoth, Bragi)<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ">Singing Rocks</span></i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "> (Ourea, Tepeyollotl)</span><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;"><b>Moderate Consequences</b>:<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ">Maelstrom</span></i> (Poseidon)<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ">Rain of Blood</span></i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "> (Ares, Mars)</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ">Swarms of Locusts</span></i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "> (Demeter, Ceres, Isis, Xipe-Totec)</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ">Turn Wine Into Water </span></i>(Dionysus, Bacchus)<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ">Visions of Death</span></i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "> (Hel, Hades, Pluto, Mictecacihuatl)</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;"><b>Severe Consequences</b>:<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ">Attracts Monster
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Hordes</span></i> (Loki,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Tlaltecuhtli)<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ">Belch Lightning</span></i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "> (Thor, Zeus, Jupiter)</span><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ">Fireblast</span></i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "> (Apollo, Xiuhtecuhtli)</span><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ">Shipwreck</span></i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "> (Poseidon, Neptune)</span><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ">Withering Crops</span></i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "> (Demeter, Ceres, Sif, Centeotl)</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><b>Recovery:</b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;"> Mild Divine Interest consequences are easily cleared;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        a minor milestone will allow one mild consequence to be cleared. But a moderate
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        one will last at least two sessions and until a significant milestone, at which
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      point it can be reduced to mild.</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">Severe
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Divine Interest consequences stick with the heroes and change them: the gods'
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        attention is now firmly on you. They will keep continuously watching you and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        they will use you as their pawn, champion, martyr, or prize in their schemes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        and struggles. Sure, they will forget about you for long stretches of time, but
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the gods' divine gaze is now firmly fixed. A severe Divine Interest consequence
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        will last at least through one significant milestone and until the next major
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      milestone.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><i>A while ago, the heroes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        took the severe consequence <b>Displeased
