                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Hera</b> by failing to serve her diligently enough. When the GM declares a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        major milestone, the group decides to change the consequence to <b>Atoning to Hera</b> and decide to make
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        some amends, perhaps go on a quest to appease her. The consequence is reduced
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      to moderate.</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><b>Being Taken out by
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Divine Interest:</b> When
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      you've already filled all four of the Divine Interest consequence slots for the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      group without a chance to clear them, and get one more such consequence, you
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      are taken out just like with regular stress. At the end of the session, you
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      will have a Divine milestone. Clear all Divine Interest consequences and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      discuss a new group aspect, which can be invoked and compelled as usual. This
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      should be an aspect the entire group, players and GM, agrees will make sense
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      and be fun in the campaign.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><b><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;">Pawn of ___</span></i></b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ">: When the god needs a cut-up for some reason,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        you end up being at hand. You find yourself in some cockamamie situation you
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        are spectacularly not suited to because the god needs a marker of some sort.</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;"><b><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;">Marked by ___</span></i></b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ">: When there is nothing more interesting going
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          on, the god checks on you, causing alarm and repercussions. You may develop a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          reputation for being bad luck.</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;"><b><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;">Embroiled in Divine Plots</span></i></b>: After one god showed
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            interest, others also paid attention. You're like the ball in this game, and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            the winner will probably spike you before forgetting about you and going out to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          celebrate.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;">If
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            you gain mostly favorable attention by doing something the gods think is neat,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            they will appear to you with a message—probably accidentally setting the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            place on fire or causing other collateral damage in the process. They may be
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            trying to impress their benevolence upon you, and generally trying to help you,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            but are in fact being as useful as you are when you help ants build their
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          little ant hill.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;">If
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            you manage to anger, disappoint, or vex the gods, they will send you the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            occasional lightning bolt strike, put dangerous and ridiculous obstacles in
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            your path, cause storms, floods, or earthquakes to follow you, or turn you into
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            a talking ox. The only thing that will provide any respite is the gods' gaze
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          turning to someone else.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;">Being
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            taken out by Divine Interest consequences can be the signal for a major
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            milestone and possibly even a re-scaling of the campaign. The heroes are now
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            embroiled in world-spanning shenanigans. In that case, combine the effects of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          both the major and Divine milestones.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;"><b>The Many Gods:</b> It is perfectly
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          possible to attract the Divine Interest of more than one deity, which may in
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        turn result in many different group aspects.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><i>After many adventures,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          the heroes managed to attract the <b>Wrath
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          of Ares</b>, the <b>Benevolence of Athena</b>,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          and probably the attention of a few other deities as well�</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><a name="Curses_and_Blessings"><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              normal">Description</b></a><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ">The gods are powerful beings who can grant
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              a worshipper</span>'s
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              petition through blessings and curses. Easily bored, they often turn an eye to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              their most unpredictable creations, the mortal beings who populate this world,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              wage war, and constantly invent clever new ways of getting in trouble. The gods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              like to intervene in mortals' affairs to guide, reward or punish, but the force
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              they use is not necessarily commensurate with their supplicants' requests. <o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">Mortals
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  can take the risk of begging the gods for these blessings and curses, knowing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  that the thunderbolt meant for an enemy may land close enough to singe the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  petitioner as well. Praying too earnestly can be dangerous; then again,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ignoring the gods, neglecting to make the proper obeisances, can attract divine
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                anger and retribution�<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">Magic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  is in many ways more trickery and taking credit for fortuitous success than
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  actual arcane workings; after all, no one wants the gods to get too close.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Priests mostly <i>pretend</i> to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  perform rituals without actually attracting attention from the gods, whose
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                appearance is dangerous even to their devotees.<span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">So
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  why do magic-users risk it? One: it works. Sort of. Sometimes. In battle it can
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  make all the difference. Two: the gods get very, very touchy when you neglect
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  them, and they react badly. Then it's not ambiguous, two-edged, or risky at
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                all: it's all bad.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">Priests'
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  objectives, then, are to minimize the amount of actual god involvement in
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mortals' affairs while maximizing the satisfaction of their flocks and patrons.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  They try to do just enough actual magic and no more, covering the rest with a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mix of sooth-saying, show-boating, quackery, and blind luck.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p> </o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><b><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;">Magic: The 30-Second Version</span></i></b><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;"><br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <!--[endif]--></span></i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ;">1. Take an
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        appropriate aspect at character creation.<br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2. Choose a ritual and perform the required chanting, dancing, and so forth.<br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3. Make an appropriate approach roll to overcome against the target of the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ritual.<br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        4. The GM marks a Divine Interest consequence.<br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      5. Cast the ritual:</span></i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      text-indent:-35.3pt;mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><i><br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      </i><b><i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      normal">General
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ritual</i></b><i>: Use to create a temporary
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      stunt on a target individual or item;<br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <b>Battle ritual</b>: Use during Roar phase
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      to create an aspect appropriate to a curse or blessing on the target group.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><o:p> </o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><a name="Use_an_Appropriate_Aspect"><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            normal">Use an
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Appropriate Aspect</b></a><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ">Not everyone can perform magic rituals;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                you need an aspect that grants permission such as</span><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                12.0pt;mso-ascii-;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "> </span><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              normal"><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ">Oracle of Apollo</span></i></b>, <b><i>Freyja-Blessed
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Seidhr</i></b>, <b><i>High Priest of Jupiter</i></b>, or <b><i>Self-Trained
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Hedge Priest of Demeter</i></b>.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><a name="Choose_a_Ritual"><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              normal">Choose a Ritual</b></a><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ">Some</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-ascii-;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              &quot;Times New Roman&quot;"> </span><i>rituals</i> have similar
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              working in all versions of Agaptan magic, although their trappings will be
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              vastly different from one faction to the next and even one school to the next.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            In addition, each has its own exclusive rituals.<span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;">Notes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              for rituals can be literal pieces of writing, but they can also be recorded as
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              complex series of knots in a string, glyphs carved in stone, etc. It's
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              difficult for a priest to decipher rituals from another school, and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              painstakingly difficult to even guess at another faction's rituals.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">Rituals'
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  primary effect is to allow a blessing or curse to be placed on a <i>target</i>—the person, place, or thing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  it's being cast on.
