Sometimes a ritual will also have a<i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  normal"> subject</i>—the person, place, group, or thing which will
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  be the focus of the ritual's effect on the target.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><i>A Rage ritual to make
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Julius angry at Lilia would be cast on Julius (the target) and focused on Lilia
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (the subject).</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><a name="Casting_A_Ritual"><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      normal">Casting A Ritual</b></a><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ">In order to cast a ritual, the priest must
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        use one or more actions to overcome the target difficulty. With a success, the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ritual creates a temporary stunt (see the list below). Rituals that produce
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        good luck or beneficial effects for the target can either give a +2 bonus in
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      narrow circumstances for one scene,</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-ascii-;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      &quot;Times New Roman&quot;"> </span><i>or</i> give a one-time
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      special effect before dissipating. Rituals that produce bad luck or negative
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      effects for the target produce a one-time special effect lasting up to one
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    scene, then dissipate.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;">Assuming
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      a single target—a person, or a thing perhaps as large as a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      hut—enough time to chant or mumble the sacred words, and the appropriate
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ritual trappings, the roll is made against a difficulty of Average (+1). So
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      long as the character succeeds, then the target gains the blessing or
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      curse—see below for details—for the scene or until it is no longer
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      dramatically appropriate, whichever comes first. Further modifications follow:<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;">[table]<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;"><b>Target<span>      Difficulty</span></b><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none">Base difficulty<span style=";mso-ascii-;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          &quot;Times New Roman&quot;"> </span><i>(self, object, or other
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        person within contact range)</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ">    Average
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (+1)</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    &quot;Times New Roman&quot;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none">Object,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        area, or person is in sight but not touch range<span>            Add
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      +1</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    &quot;Times New Roman&quot;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none">Target
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        person not present, but a powerful symbolic tie to them is present <i>(their blood, a treasured possession)</i><span>  Add +2</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none">Target person
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          not present, but is known and named, or is a known location<span>        Add
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        +3</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      &quot;Times New Roman&quot;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none">Target is as
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          big as a ship or small building<span>      Add
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        +1</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      &quot;Times New Roman&quot;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none">Target is as
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          big as a large building or arena<span>    Add
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        +2</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      &quot;Times New Roman&quot;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none">Target is as
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          big as a small town<span>  Add +3</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none">Unforeseen
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              difficulties <i>(performing the ritual
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              in a rush, while underwater, at spear point)</i><span style="mso-tab-count:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1">           Add +1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              to +3 <i>(GM's discretion)</i></span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none">Praying to a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  god you have angered<i> (having
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  unfavorable Divine Interest consequences or aspects)</i><span style="mso-tab-count:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  1">            Add
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +2</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              &quot;Times New Roman&quot;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none">Unwilling
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  target<span>        Add
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                +1</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              &quot;Times New Roman&quot;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ">[/table]</span><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none"><br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Larger targets require much more time, the efforts of several priests, and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                luck.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              &quot;Times New Roman&quot;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none">Some rituals
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  have a subject, such as a ritual that makes your lord mad at his daughter. The
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  absence of that subject similarly impacts the difficulty: +0 if present, +3 if
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  you only have a name, as above. The one qualifier is that if the subject can be
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  made to accept some token of the ritual—a potion, a trinket—then
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  they are effectively "present." Such tokens must be used within a short time,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                typically three days.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none">Success with
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  style on a ritual generates a boost   as normal.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none">No target
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      can be the focus of more than one ritual at a time. The newest ritual replaces
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    the existing one.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none">Some
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      blessings and curses have their own additional modifiers.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none">High
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          difficulties can be beaten by having multiple priests working together and by
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          treating the ritual as a challenge (see <b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          normal">"Challenges"</b>.) Create as many steps as you need, assigning static
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          difficulties; the sum of these difficulties must be equal to or greater than
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the ritual difficulty you calculated.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><i>Coronos, priest of Ares,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          is performing a ritual to bless his brother Vettias with good luck; however
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Vettias is halfway across Achaea, doesn't <b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          normal">want</b> Coronos's help (or any attention from Ares for that
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          matter), and Coronos has recently displeased Ares by fleeing from battle. He
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          has the Divine consequence <b>Coward
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          in Ares' Eyes</b>. The difficulty to cast the spell therefore is +1 (starting),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          +1 (unwilling target), +3 (Coronos has no link to Vettias), +2 (Ares is
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          displeased), for a total of Epic (+7). Vettias won't go into combat for another
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          day, and Coronos has two assistant priests nearby to help him out. They cast
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          the ritual together and break the difficult ritual into three smaller
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        challenges. </i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><i>Using Skills: First, one
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          of them prays to Ares to forgive Coronos, a Fair (+2) difficulty using the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          skill Propitiate, then another focuses the ritual on Vettias at a Fair (+2)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          difficulty, and finally Coronos <b>forces</b> his
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          no-good stubborn brother to accept the blessing at a Good (+3) difficulty.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;"><i>Using Approaches: First,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              one of them Flashily prays to Ares to forgive Coronos, a Fair (+2) difficulty,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              then another Carefully focuses the ritual on Vettias at a Fair (+2) difficulty,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              and finally Coronos Forcefully <b>forces</b> his
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              no-good stubborn brother to accept the blessing at a Good (+3) difficulty.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">Casting
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  a ritual incurs a Divine Interest consequence. The priest can eliminate this
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  cost—in other words, avoid Divine Interest—by performing the ritual
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  as a challenge instead of a single overcome action: one roll to avoid the god's
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  attention, one roll to cast the ritual, and one roll to make it look
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                coincidental.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;"><i>Coronos is at it again!
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  He's trying to perform another difficult ritual but this time he's all alone,
