                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;">Two
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Steps Ahead of You: For one scene, the target gets +2 to Quickly overcome obstacles
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  and challenges that are also based on speed.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><i>A band of soldiers are
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    pounding on the door of the abandoned farm house where our heroes are spending
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    the night. Gudrun the Witch asks her daughter Siggi to hide in the root cellar
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    while she goes out to check the source of ominous noises. Before she leaves,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    she casts a Safety ritual, invoking Frigg's protection.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><i>The target (Siggi) is
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        present (+0), normal size (+0), there is no specific subject because Gudrun
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        doesn't know who the threat is, so the difficulty would normally be Average
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (+1). However, time is of the essence so Gudrun wants to shorten the ritual;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the GM says this will increase the difficulty to Fair (+2) and require the use
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        of the Quick approach.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;"><i>Gudrun's player agrees
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            and rolls for Gudrun's ritual, to Quickly create an advantage; the dice
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          roll [</i>0+00] <i>and Gudrun's Quick approach is +2, for a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          total of +3 (Good), which beats the difficulty. Gudrun's ritual gives Siggi the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        stunt </i><b>Nothing Going On Here</b><i>.</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><i>The GM notes a mild
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Divine Interest consequence for casting a ritual; the roll and result did not
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          generate additional points.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><a name="Battle_Rituals"><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              normal">Battle Rituals</b></a><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ">A particular type of ritual, called</span><span style="mso-ascii-;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "> </span><i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            normal">battle
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            rituals</i>,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            are used<span>  to affect the priest's
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            entire side of the conflict <b>before the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            actual conflict begins</b>. They work differently from general ritual: instead
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            of creating temporary stunts, the priest uses the battle ritual to create
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            magical situation aspects with free invocations. Battle rituals' effects
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            typically last until the end of the conflict scene. </span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;">Battle
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                rituals have a fixed difficulty of Fair (+2) to cast.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;">Optional:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    If you are using the Roar Phase rules, battle rituals are used <i>only</i> during the Roar phase and call on
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    the power of its transcendent state. After the Roar phase, priests can still
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    cast general rituals that provide temporary stunts for individual targets, but
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    the time for roaring is passed.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><b>Combat Fury:</b> The priest
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      intercedes to the unit's god, asking to lend special strength and savagery in
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      combat. Very similar to the Rage ritual below, but fine-tuned for the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      battlefield. Creates advantages like <i>Divine
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Savagery</i>, <i>Divine Wrath</i>,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      or <i>Divine Strength</i>. By spending
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      a fate point or using a free invocation and invoking for effect, the targets of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      the ritual can also make one attack lethal (see <i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      normal">"Lethal Attacks"</i>).<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><b>Troop Movement</b>: A priest may ask
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the unit's god for assistance in moving them across the battlefield. Hopefully
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the god will move them in the intended direction. Creates advantages like <i>Pushed by a Divine Wind</i>, <i>A Burst of Speed</i>, or <i>Right Where They Should Be</i>. By spending
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        a fate point or using a free invocation and invoking for effect, the targets
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      can also move an extra zone for free.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><b>O God Avoid Us, Seek Out
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Those We Fight</b>: This
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      battle ritual is similar to the (Bad) Luck ritual above, but placing a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      temporary mild Divine Interest consequence on the enemy for the scene. Weapons
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      miss, the sun glints off the enemy's armor, etc. Creates advantages like Ze<i>us Disapproves</i>, <i>How Could This Have Missed?</i>, or <i>Nope, Not Today</i>. By spending a fate
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      point or using a free invocation and invoking for effect, force the next
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      consequence that would result from an attack to be taken as a Divine Interest
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    consequence.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><b>Our God Will Smite Them
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    All!</b>: War
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    priests use this ritual to whip troops into a frenzy for the scene. Creates
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    advantages like <i>Smite, SMITE!</i>, <i>Our Blows Land True</i>, or <i>All At Once!</i>. By spending a fate point
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    or using a free invocation and invoking for effect, the targets can also take
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    one additional mild consequence before being taken out (useable only once per
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    conflict per target). After the conflict, the extra mild consequence remains
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  until cleared normally. <span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><b>We Are Legion!</b>: Battle priests
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  use this ritual to bolster the focus and discipline of units for the scene,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  helping them through the often complex battlefield maneuvers required by
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  commanders. Creates advantages like <i>Soldiers,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Advance!</i>, <i>Form Up the Ranks!</i>,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  or <i>To Me, Brothers!</i>. By spending
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  a fate point or using a free invocation and invoking for effect, the targets
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  can also ignore adverse terrain aspects for all zones they move through this
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  turn. In other words, these aspects cannot be invoked against them to oppose
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                movement.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><b>Using skills</b>:<span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ">Chaka the shaman, in preparation for the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                upcoming battle, casts the ritual </span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ">"Troop Movement" on his scout unit to help them
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                make it through the dense forest and flank the enemy. Chaka's player rolls [</span>+0+-] plus his Will (+2)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                versus the difficulty of Fair (+2), for a total of +1 (Average) and a success.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The scouts can now use the aspect <b><i>Stalking on Leopards' Feet</i></b> with one
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                free invocation. The group also gets one Divine Interest consequence for the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              use of magic.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><b>Using approaches and the Roar
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                phase</b>:<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><i>During the Roar phase, Sven casts the ritual </i><i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;">"Our God Will Smite Them All!" on the crew of the </span></i>Skyhammer<i> to get them ready to fight in the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                upcoming boarding action against the </i>Fiero<i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              normal">. The difficulty is Fair (+2).</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
