                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;"><i>Sven yells to the sky
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                and sea for aid and the group agrees that sounds like the Flashy (+3) approach.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Sven's player rolls an amazing [</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ">++++]<i>, for
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              a total of +5 (Superb) and succeeds with style.</i></span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;"><i>Sven is now roaring with
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  the aspect <b>Smite, SMITE!</b> and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  is limited to using the Forceful, Flashy, and Clever approaches to maintain the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ritual during the conflict.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><i>The crew of the </i>Skyhammer<i> rejoice and can use the <b>Smite, SMITE!</b> aspect normally or
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    invoke it for effect to gain an extra mild consequence for the fight.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><i>The gods take notice of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        course. The group gets one Divine Interest consequence for Sven casting the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ritual and a second for the natural [</i><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      12.0pt;">++++]<i> that
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      was rolled. It could be Tyr excited by the battle, but the GM thinks it will be
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    more fun for Loki to take notice!</i></span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><a name="Wondrous_Artifacts_of_the_Anci"><b><span style="mso-bidi-font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      12.0pt;;">Wondrous
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Artifacts of the Ancients</span></b></a><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ">Our Ancient ruins are to fantasy worlds
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          what abandoned Roman roads, bridges, temples, and aqueducts would have been to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          inhabitants of the British Isles circa 900 A.D. They also borrow flavors from
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ancient marvels of architecture from around the world like the ones left by the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Mayans, Inca, Zhou Chinese, Ancient Egyptians, Khmer, etc., and from fiction
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          like legendary Atlantis, Mu, Shambhala, and so forth.</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;">They
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              are forgotten, made nearly invisible by their ubiquity; everywhere in Sentia
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              one sees ruins, and entire villages and cities are built among these. In
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              addition, the incipient ice age has driven the land's inhabitants to live
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              underground more and more often; what better place than the catacombs, vaults,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              and half-buried palaces of the Ancients, with their unmatched masonry?<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;"><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p> </o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><b>Is it Magic?</b><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;">These
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      marvels are not magic, except in the sense of Arthur C. Clarke's Third Law
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ("Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic."); they
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      come from advanced but forgotten knowledge. Based on real-world knowledge
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      developed millennia ago but either forgotten or never applied to practical
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    uses, we could picture advances in:<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none">architecture<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none">civil
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      engineering<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none">mining and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      metallurgy<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none">cartography<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none">navigation,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          including instruments like the compass, backstaff, astrolabe, quadrants,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        sextant, tide tables<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none">astronomy,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          including instruments like ephemerids, simple telescopes, and armillary spheres<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none">medicine and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            anatomy<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none">mathematics<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none">textiles and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              dyes<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            &quot;Times New Roman&quot;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none">printing<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none">paints and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                lacquers<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none">physics and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                chemistry<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none">masonry,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                stone-cutting, and mosaic<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none">glass-blowing,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ceramics, glazes<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none">Ship-building<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;">And
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    probably many more; mysterious, poorly understood knowledge. No magic need be
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  involved.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><a name="Mechanics"><b><span style="mso-bidi-;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ">Mechanics</span></b></a><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ">Ancient wonders work primarily as plot
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      drivers, influencing the story: MacGuffins, </span><i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
