                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">Let's
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  look at a second example, something that is still a building but where the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  original function is versatile and harder to guess at.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><b>Example 2: The ruins of an Ancient apothecary shop.</b><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ">When you open the scene, you may have this
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      listed as a </span><i>Small
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Half-Collapsed Building</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;;color:black"> and let the players do a bit of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    snooping—perhaps treated as a challenge—before they can discover
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    the aspect <i>Half-Collapsed Apothecary Shop</i>.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Note that we've now replaced or redefined what was a scene aspect. Now, every
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    time they return, the PCs will find the <i>Half-Collapsed
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Apothecary Shop</i>, at least until they manage to demolish it further�</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">The
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        players may want to get some practical use out of a location like this, so if
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this is meant to be a chance for them to reduce some consequences they have
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      taken previously, you could assign it the stunt:<span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><b>Ancient Apothecary Shop</b>:<i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      normal"><span> </i>Because
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      this is an Ancient apothecary shop, heroes get +2 to a recovery check when
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      fighting off the effects of an illness (recovering from a consequence.)</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;">You
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          may want to limit such a location's use if you don't want to see it become the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          convenience store open all night which they keep visiting to fix problems. One
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          way to do this is to assign narrower circumstances for use, such as a specific
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          illness or type of illness. Another is to assign a number of uses after which,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          the supplies or equipment are exhausted. <i><span>Once</i> is a perfectly
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        valid number!</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;">Here
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          is an example of public works where the original function might seem very
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          difficult to understand at first. Its function is specialized but potentially
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          very important to the setting.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><b>Example 3: The ruins of a canal and lock system.</b><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ">Depending on how damaged it is, it may not
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              contain water when the heroes first see it; or it might be iced over if it</span>'s located in the north
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              or the adventure takes place at some time other than the short summer months.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              At each end is a body of water, at different elevations.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">The
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  high concept to discover would be <span>Canal and Lock
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    System. If the PCs succeed in restoring it to a working state and the climate
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    conditions allow it, a stunt would become available:</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><b>Ancient Canal and Lock
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System</b>:<i><span> </i>Because this is an Ancient lock system, once per session
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (or twice a day, or other reasonable time increment that the GM wants) it
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        allows a ship to move between Water Body A and Water Body B.</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;">However,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            the importance of such a site is not just about moving a ship where you couldn't
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            before; it's about acquiring that knowledge and using it in other locations.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;">What
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                about something portable, specialized, and arcane?<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><b>Example 4: Ancient compass.</b><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    ">This device might be very damaged; if of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    the wet type, it would probably have dried up and requires refilling with water
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    or clear alcohol and resealing; if of the dry type, the needle might need
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    re-mounting and the moving parts cleaning and waxing.</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">Understanding,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        refurbishing, and using the device can be handled as a challenge, perhaps over
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        a long period. Even after the compass is in working order again, its usefulness
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      for navigation might not be obvious.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">The
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        high concept could be simply called <i><span>Compass</i>, or <i>A Device That Always Points in the Same
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Direction</i>. Understanding its usefulness would make a stunt available:</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;">Ancient
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Compass:<i><span> </i>Because this device always points north, heroes get +2 to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Carefully overcome obstacles when orienting their course.</span><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;">Now
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                let's look at something portable, versatile, and fairly complex but relatively
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              easy to figure out.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><b>Example 5: Ancient multi-tool.</b><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;"><i>Did you know the Romans
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              had invented multi-tools? It's true!</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;">If
