                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                the tool is in good shape, it becomes fairly easy to guess at the purpose of a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                few of the attachments; if it's very damaged and partly disintegrated due to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rust, it may be much more difficult.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;">The
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                primary aspect will be something like <i><span>Folding Multi-Tool</i>.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Once a hero figures out how to make the various parts move, some potential
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                stunts may come to mind; but now we're looking at many different stunts that
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              apply in many different circumstances.</span><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;">Instead
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                of trying to list them, it may make more sense to just grant a number of free
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                invocations of the high concept aspect, say one or two per session. It can of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                course be invoked as normal at the cost of a fate point. For flavor, it might
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                be renamed to something like <i><span>I Have the Tool for That!</i><span style="color:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              black">.</span></span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;">Because
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                it might be a coveted item that sees a lot of use, the GM might also want to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                give it a stress track, say one or two boxes, and even a minor consequence to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                represent some of the tools getting warped or broken.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <!--[endif]--></span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><a name="Creating_Wonders_The_30Second_"><b><span style="mso-bidi-font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      12.0pt;;">Creating
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Wonders: The 30-Second Version</span></b></a><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;">1.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Give the Wondrous Creation a High Concept representing its purpose or nature,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          and a Flaw representing its dangers or weaknesses.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;">2.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If it will be important enough to feature significantly in more than one scene,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              give it one or two other aspects such as a descriptive aspect, or a secret
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              representing hidden characteristics. If the heroes discover the secret in play,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rephrase it as a known aspect.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">3.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  If it is still able to perform its function, or restored to a working state,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  give it a stunt—something that will give a bonus to those using it or
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                allow a special effect once a day.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">4.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  If you want to limit the use of such stunt, give it a number of uses and check
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  one off after every use. When all the use boxes are checked off, the stunt
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                stops working for good.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">5.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  If the Wondrous Creation is a coveted item that sees a lot of use, the GM might
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  also want to give it a stress track, say one or two boxes, and even a minor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  consequence to represent some of its parts getting warped or broken.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="page-break-before:always;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><a name="Adventure_Creation_Expanded"><b><span style="mso-bidi-;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ">Adventure Creation, Expanded</span></b></a><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none">This section expands on the advice provided in <b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    &quot;Liberation Mono&quot;">Chapter 9</span></b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "> of <i>Fate
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Core</i> using a method for writing scenarios called <i style="mso-bidi-font-style:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    normal">Fractal Adventures</i>, which relies heavily on the Bronze Rule
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    of Fate. It was created by author Ryan M. Danks, and a more detailed
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    discussion of the method can be found on his website, starting with Fate Core:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Adventure Fractal </span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><a href="http://ryanmdanks.com/?p=476"><span style=";color:windowtext;text-decoration:none;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    text-underline:none">http://ryanmdanks.com/?p=476</span></a></span> .<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ">A</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-ascii-;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      &quot;Times New Roman&quot;"> </span><i>scenario</i> or <i>adventure</i> is one short story arc,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      the sort of thing you might see wrapped up in one or two sessions of an
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      adventure television show, even if it's a smaller part of a bigger story.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Usually you can wrap up a scenario in one to three game sessions, assuming you
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      play for three or four hours at a time. But what is a scenario, and how do you
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    build one?<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><b>Creating A Scenario: The 30-Second Version</b><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none">1. Pick a Goal and
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      High Concept Aspect<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none">2. Find Problems<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none">3. Pick a Trouble
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Aspect<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none">4. Scene List: Ask
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Story Questions<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
