                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none">5. Pick Adventure
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Aspects and Approaches<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none">6. Establish the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Opposition<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        text-autospace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none">7. Set the First Scene<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ">Once you get the hang of it, writing an
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            adventure should take about twenty minutes, assuming you already know what the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          story will be about.</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><a name="Goal_and_High_Concept_Aspect"><b><span style="mso-bidi-font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            12.0pt;;">Goal
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            and High Concept Aspect</span></b></a><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ">First, you need a goal; this is the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                problem(s) the story will center around. What is it the PCs want? Create an
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                aspect to represent the goal; you can call it the adventure</span>'s high concept.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;">Once
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    you know the goal, decide whether or not the PCs will obtain their
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    goal---"maybe" is a sufficient answer here, relying on the PCs to determine
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    success or failure on their own. It isn't always necessary that they succeed;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  failure leads to more adventures.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  none;"><br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <!--[endif]--><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><a name="Find_Problems"><b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      normal">Find Problems</b></a><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ">Scen</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ">arios are centered around a problem which the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      heroes will try to solve, encountering twists and turns as they move towards
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    resolution.</span><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><b>A scenario needs two
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    things:</b> An
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    adversary with a goal and a reason the PCs can't ignore it.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><b>Adversary with a goal:</b> You've probably
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      figured this out already. The campaign's main opposition, or one of his allies,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      is probably your adversary.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><b>Something the PCs can't
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ignore:</b> Now
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        you have to give the PCs a reason to care. Make sure the adversary's goal is up
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        in the PCs' faces, where they need to do something about it or bad things will
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        happen to them, or to people or things they value.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;">And
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          that's how your "problem" is born.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;">Here's
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            the best tool to make sure the PCs can't ignore the hook: go fishing from their
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            character sheets for problems they <i>want</i> to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            interact with, and from the campaign aspects for problems which they are <i>bribed</i> to tackle.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><b>Problems and Character Aspects</b><span style="font-size:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            12.0pt;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ">Look at the characters</span>' aspects and see if
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              anything can make a nice juicy core problem for an adventure. When you're
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              trying to get a problem from a character aspect, try fitting it into this
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            sentence:<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;">You
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              have <b>[aspect]</b>, which implies that <b>[fact about that character or the world]</b>.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Because of that, it would be probably be a big problem if <b style="mso-bidi-font-weight:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            normal">[describe a situation]</b>.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;">The
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              second blank is what makes this a little harder than an event compel---you have
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              to think about all the different potential implications of an aspect (and this
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              may be a list of things, by the way). Here are some questions to help with
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            that.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          &quot;Times New Roman&quot;"><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;">Who
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              might have a problem with the character because of this aspect?<o:p></o:p>
