                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">Does
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  the aspect point to a potential threat to that character?<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;">Does
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      the aspect describe a connection or relationship that could cause trouble for
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    the character?<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;">Does
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      the aspect speak to a backstory element that could come back to haunt the character?<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;">Does
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          the aspect describe something or someone important to the character that you
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        can threaten?<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;">As
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          long as whatever you put in the third blank makes a nice story problem, you're
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        good to go.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        none;"><i>Ulf Long-Teeth has <b>The Good Ship </b></i>Blaggard<i>, which implies that he inherited his ship
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        from somewhere. Because of that, it would be a problem for him if he was
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        challenged for command.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;"><i>Iva the Stubborn
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            is <b>Searching for Her Banished Lover</b>,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            which implies that her lover has enemies at home. Because of this, it would be
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            a problem for her if she needed help from one of his enemies to find her
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          lover's whereabouts.</i><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          none;"><i>Rustica Bibulus is
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            a <b>Connoisseur of Atronian Folklore</b>,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            which implies that such folklore may contain elements of truth that have been
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            overlooked by scholars. Because of this, it would be a problem for her if the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            pursuit of an obscure legend brought her face to snout with a mythical monster.</i><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="margin-bottom:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              6.0pt;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              "><b>Problems and Game Aspects</b><span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              none;"><span style=";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ">Problems you get from a game</span>'s current and impending
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              issues will be a little wider in scope than character-driven problems,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              affecting all your PCs and possibly a significant number of NPCs as well. The
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              game aspects include the ones you chose in your campaign creation process, any
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              scenario or adventure aspects, and perhaps some lingering aspects from a previous
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            adventure.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;">Attach
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              one or two aspects to the adventure you're designing; you can use the aspects
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              suggested with every story seed in this book such as the ones attached to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              location descriptions, or come up with ones that are tailored for your group. As
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              an incentive for players to get involved, you can allow one free invoke per
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              adventure, or even one per game session for multi-session scenarios;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              alternately, you can use it as a compel on the PCs, offering them fate points
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            for going along with the problem.<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            none;"><b>When you're trying to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              get a problem from a game aspect, try fitting it into this sentence:</b><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                none;">Because
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <b>[aspect]</b> is an issue, it implies <b>[fact about the character or the world]</b>.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Therefore, <b>[describe a situation]</b>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  would probably create a big problem for the heroes.<o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    none;"><b>Ask yourself:</b><o:p></o:p>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">What
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      threats does the issue present to the PCs?<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">Who
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        are the driving forces behind the issue, and what messed up thing might they be
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      willing to do to advance their agenda?<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">Who
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        else cares about dealing with the issue, and how might their "solution" be bad
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      for the PCs?<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;">What's
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        a good next step for resolving the issue, and what makes accomplishing that
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      step hard?<span style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    "><o:p></o:p></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <p  style="
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      mso-layout-grid-align:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      none;"><i>Because the <b>Lost Island of Konar�</b> is an issue,
